BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Don't enable docvalues by default for the time being. (#124787) By change index.mapping.use_doc_values_skipper setting's default to false.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Unmute LogsdbIndexingRollingUpgradeIT tests (#124851) These test failed briefly because https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/124803 was merged and https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/124787 wasn't. Fixes #124830 Fixes #124831 Fixes #124833
